## AppProfile.getSettingsConfig property

Profiles may supply a settings configuration to be used by resources. This is a template describing the settings properties and UX. The default values will be set on new resource instances, and the template will be used to populate the global settings UX panel controls for each instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSettingsConfig?: () => SettingsConfig;
```
